title: Masala Wala
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A small, family run Pakistani restaurant. Menu typically has 2 vegan main dishes (out of 4). All the sides and condiments are vegetarian, all but the yogurt and mint dip can be made vegan. Staff aware of what vegan is and what is suitable. No bookings taken for groups less than 5. BYOB for Â£2.50 per person. Out of Brockley station, turn left. Cross at crossing and it's on your right.
